title: Is PES good for BSc Economics??
content:
I really wanna know if PES is good for B.Sc. Economics. Ik that PES is good for engineering, but I have no idea how good it is for Economics

I even wanted to know about the placement for BSc Economics, as there is no official record or placement stats on the website 

I am even considering pursuing the CFA parallel.

comments.body: I am an economics faculty in Azim Premji University. PES does not have a good economics program. In Bangalore Christ university would be the best option. National law School Banngalore is also starting a new economic program and have very good faculty. There is no good placement cell for economics in colleges however the brand value and degree will translate into a job after your degree. If you want a good job from a placement cell then a masters or MBA degree is a must.
Also just pointing out that to write Level 1, you need to be in your penultimate year minimum. So you still have some time to go for that
